Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Ejector rack retention failure. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 06/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
